channel.title: Quick pimpscape question, please help
channel.description: ok, in my server (pimpscape based) i made prayer lvling faster by making each bone give 500k xp. but heres the problem, if i bury too fast my weapon disappears. and if i bury it without a weapon, i get 150 xp. can i fix this?[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 08:55:38 PM[/size][hr].[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 09:47:20 AM[/size][hr]please?

item.title: Quick pimpscape question, please help
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Make a command that gives 99 prayâ€¦

If (command.equals.IgnoreCase("prayer")) { addSkillXP(13000000, 5); sendMessage("You have 99 prayer, thanks to mail`"); }
